definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在竞选中他期待更多超级代表的选票。

sentences.english: The only problem is whether I have enough money to win with it.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的问题是不知道我是否有足够的钱来买选票。

sentences.english: Lin Tao won the most votes.
So the combat went hand to hand, both men clawing for every last vote.
sentences.chinese: 因此战争继续，每个人都在为最后的选票拼命。

sentences.english: McGrady himself called it "crazy" that he has received so many All-Star votes.
sentences.chinese: 麦迪对自己得到这么多全明星选票的形容是“疯狂”。

sentences.english: Being more attractive could help a candidate garner more votes.
sentences.chinese: 更具有魅力可能有助于候选人获得更多的选票。

sentences.english: Others, he said, defaced their ballot papers.
sentences.chinese: 他说，还有一些选民故意损坏了自己的选票。

sentences.english: Samdhong Rinpoche won with 90 percent of the votes.
sentences.chinese: 桑东仁波切获得90%的选票当选。

sentences.english: The newest opinion poll demonstrated that law Tull already had about 10,000 ballots.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民调显示，法塔尔已经拥有大约1万张选票。

sentences.english: He says there are no fictitious polling stations or pre-marked ballots.
sentences.chinese: 他说，没有假投票站或做好记号的选票。

sentences.english: An "X" in the circle beside the name of my chosen candidate.
sentences.chinese: 在我选票的候选人名字旁画上一个“X“。

sentences.english: Your party choice applies only to the King County primary ballot you complete in August.
sentences.chinese: 你所选的政党只应用于在景郡初选你填的选票。

sentences.english: Contests can either allow write-in votes or not.
sentences.chinese: 竞选人可以允许或禁止补名选票。

sentences.english: She did not win a majority of the Somali-American votes in her district.
sentences.chinese: 她在自己的选区未能赢得多数索马里裔美国人的选票。

sentences.english: It's thought the counting and collation of the presidential votes could take the longest.
sentences.chinese: 据测总统大选选票的计算和收集将会花费最长时间。

sentences.english: Well, certainly, Mr. Naughton, you realize that you cannot buy votes on Capital Hill.
sentences.chinese: 当然，诺顿先生，你认识到你不能够在国会山买选票。

definition: to campaign for votes/to ask voters for support
